description: This file defines a LoginPage component for a React-based frontend. It manages the login form, handles user authentication, displays success or error toasts, and navigates upon successful login.

methods.name: LoginPage()
methods.description: React functional component that renders the login form, manages login process, displays notifications, and navigation.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Async function that handles form submission, performs login, displays appropriate toasts, and handles errors.
